UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A novel lantibiotic acting on bacterial cell wall synthesis produced by the uncommon actinomycete Planomonospora sp.
Literature.Author: Castiglione F, Cavaletti L, Losi D, Lazzarini A, Carrano L, Feroggio M, Ciciliato I, Corti E, Candiani G, Marinelli F, Selva E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Smith(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MIC=>128µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium VR(MIC=128µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum ATCC 8014(MIC=64µg/ml),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus ATCC 7469T(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. lactis ATCC 4797(MIC=16µg/ml),Limosilactobacillus fermentum ATCC 9338 (MIC=0.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 13632(MIC=2µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens ATCC 13124(MIC=<=0.25µg/ml),Moraxella catarrhalis ATCC 8176(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>128µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>128µg/ml)
